name: $100 OG
description: $100 OG is a 50/50 hybrid strain that packs a strong punch. The name supposedly refers to both its strength and high price when it first started showing up in Hollywood. As a plant, $100 OG tends to produce large dark green buds with few stems. Users report a strong body effect of an indica for pain relief with the more alert, cerebral feeling thanks to its sativa side.
descriptionPlain: $100 OG is a 50/50 hybrid strain that packs a strong punch. The name supposedly refers to both its strength and high price when it first started showing up in Hollywood. As a plant, $100 OG tends to produce large dark green buds with few stems. Users report a strong body effect of an indica for pain relief with the more alert, cerebral feeling thanks to its sativa side.

highlightedReviews.text: hits you like a ton of bricks, i didnt even hit it but three times and completely forgot what i was doing, then ate two boxes of cereal
Nice, relaxing high, my head was fairly clear :) Definitely would recommend to anyone who wants to relax. Also I think you could work after smoking a little bit, but not too much

articles.title: The Leafly Strain Reviews Hall of Fame: Part 1
articles.author: Kayla Williams
articles.text:
Strain review moderation at the Leafly Headquarters is often the source of office-wide glee, disbelief, and almost always a round of chuckles. It's also largely why we're so excited that you can share reviews now. Below is a collection of some of the reviews that made us smile. We hope they amuse, inspire, and prompt you to write some reviews of your own! 
100 OG

Pure poetry.
 
Afghan Kush

Now I want to know what happened to this person on that particular date in 1985.
 
Trainwreck


Here's a strain that lives up to its name.
 
White Widow

I can't tell if that's a good thing or a bad thing. 
 
AK 47

Cannabis consumers: always the optimists.
 
Blue Dream

Funner things are the bestest.
 
Alaskan Thunder Fuck

This person ran to the border, then passed the border, then ran back across the border to hit up the drive-thru. 
 
Granddaddy Purple

#DangFlabbit
 
Headband


What is it with this strain and face abuse? 
 
Green Crack

The motherload of all reviews. Wow. Just wow.
 
Liquid Butter

TMI, friend.
 
Jack Herer 
As if the flexing hadn't convinced me to try Jack Herer, the second review confirmed it.
 
Northern Lights

Aw, Northern Lights thinks you're special, too, buddy.
 
OG Kush

This strain makes you clever.
 
Sour Diesel

Hate when that happens.
 
Purple Kush

Don't smoke crack, kids.
Header image source
